trialText: 14 day free trial. No credit card required.

developers.title: Built for Developers
developers.subtitle: Built on top of a extensible data model, Gather is designed to be easy to integrate and easy to extend.

codeSamples.title: Gather.js
API
codeSamples.code:
curl https://api.gatherdata.co/models/account/records \
  -d id="account_123"
  -d name="Lovelace, Inc"
  -d country="England"

{
    "id": "account_123",
    "name": "Lovelace, Inc",
    "country": "England",
}

customers.title: Powering success & support for thousands of customers

testimonials.testimonial: “Gather has helped us to exceed our customers’ expectations. We’ve achieved best-in-breed retention numbers and developed customer champions who have helped us grow organically.”
testimonials.name: Karim Butt

footerCta.title: Let's get started
footerCta.subtitle: 14 day free trial. No credit card required.

features.title: Customer Success Management
features.subtitle: Understand the customer journey with Gather’s unified customer view, predict customer churn and monitor unexpected behaviors and create sequences to operationalize success to increase activation and prevent churn.

featureDataEngine.title: Data Engine
featureDataEngine.copy: All of the data you need to ensure your customers are successful integrated in one place. We automatically populate a timeline for you to explore context and help you build smart segments.

featureIQ.title: Intelligence
featureIQ.copy: Predict churn with higher level metrics like the customer health score. Get notified when customers are behaving unexpectedly with monitoring and alerting so your team never misses another opportunity to intervene.

benefits.title: Intelligent anomaly detection based on trend analysis

featureOrchestrate.title: Orchestrate
featureOrchestrate.copy: Build a process to take action when behaviors are unexpected. Improve your team’s productivity and ensure customers continue to receive consistent value from your relationship as you scale.

subtitle: Understand which customers are at risk of churning, proactively reach them and measure your results.
title: Do you know who your most at risk customers are?
